channel.title: Metadata on Arc
channel.description: Recent content in Metadata on Arc

item.title: Metadata
item.description: The metadata format, consumed in the TypingTransform stage, is an opinionated format for specifying common data typing actions. It is designed to: Support common data typing conversions found in business datasets. Support limited ‘schema evolution’ of source data in the form of allowed lists of accepted input formats. Collect errors into array columns so that a user can decide how to handle errors once all have been collected. Common Attributes Attribute Type Required Description id String true A unique identifier for this field.
